source_objects.description: Take your management skills to the next level with these course in negotiation, leadership, people management and more.
source_objects.title: Management

items.title: Stakeholder Engagement for Sustainability Professionals
items.headline: Step-by-step Guide to Stakeholder Engagement
objectives_summary: Execute a structured stakeholder engagement process
Improve decision-making within an organisation based on the outcomes of stakeholder engagement

items.title: Ethical Codes for Translators and Interpreters
items.headline: Understanding the ethical codes for Australia, Brazil, and The United States of America
objectives_summary: By the end of this course, the student will be able to understand the concept of ethics and its importance for translators and interpreters.
By the end of this course, the student will be able to mention at least one major component of the ethical code of each one of the countries we study.
By the end of this course, the student will be able to suggest improvements to each one of the ethical codes we here study.

visible_instructors.job_title: Real World Trainer in Personal Effectiveness

items.headline: Dealing with the Challenges of Volatility, Uncertainty, Complexity and Ambiguity
objectives_summary: Thrive amidst volatility, uncertainty, complexity and ambiguity.
Reognise the need to select what you focus on
Build a strategic network of valuable contacts

items.title: Product Strategy - Strategic Competitive Analysis
items.headline: Learn the competitive forces that impact your industry and how to counter them.
objectives_summary: Understand the various factors that increase the competitive pressure on industries.
Analyze your own industry for those competitive pressures.
Develop a strategy to combat the competitive pressure exerted on your industry.

items.title: Manager Leadership Essential Soft Skills (New/Existing Mgrs)
items.headline: Learn Essential People Management Techniques from 2 Tutors with a combined 50 years of Global Management Experience
objectives_summary: A lifetime of experience in a course that gives you the SOFT SKILLS now that take a lifetime to learn on your own. We wish we had these skills when we started!
You will learn our SOFT SKILLS SYSTEMS that make it easier for you to Manage People and allow you bring your personality to your role.
You will see how once you know our easy to learn, fast  'SOFT SKILLS SYSTEMS', Managing People becomes an enjoyable activity.

items.title: From Manager To Leader: Simplified Leadership For Success
items.headline: You manage things; you lead people. Become the management leader of tomorrow to lead your people to success and profit!
objectives_summary: Learn the aspects of management and organization to lead successfully
Understand the traits of a leader and what defines it
Absorb different leadership styles and what might work best for you

items.title: How to Effectively Provide Negative Feedback to Employees

visible_instructors.title: Elaina Noell

items.headline: Drive engagement, accountability and get positive results in a positive way
objectives_summary: How to effectively provide negative feedback in a way that gets positive results!
Build core leadership and communication skills
Primarily intended for applying to leadership, but concepts also work in personal communication

items.title: Write a Job Ad and Candidate Screening - Starf
items.headline: Learn a quick way to hire the right person
objectives_summary: Write a Job Ad that gets the right person
Save time and screen response so you interview only the right people
Follow a systematic recruitment process that is fair and equitable (complies to anti-discrimination laws)

items.title: USAF Supply Chain Management 346 / Equipment Specialist 1670
items.headline: Learn the roles and responsibilities of Supply Chain Managers (0346) and  Equipment Specialist (1670)
objectives_summary: - Roles of the Supply Chain Program Manger and Equipment Specialist
National Stock Numbers and DLA history
- Excel beyond getting hired

items.title: Customer Experience Transformation Program
items.headline: Learn the Art and Science of Customer Experience and how small businesses can leverage CX to gain competitive advantage.
objectives_summary: Customer Experience Management
Customer Journey Mapping
CX for Sales and Customer lifetime Value

items.title: Risk Management Professional - PMI-RMP Practice Exam.

visible_instructors.name: Ahmed Atif
visible_instructors.title: Ahmed Atif Sherif
visible_instructors.job_title: Project Control Engr.| PMP®| PMI-RMP®| PMO-CP®| PRMG

items.headline: General Questions Tests + Tools /Techniques (Appendix-D) Questions Tests
objectives_summary: Are you ready to pass the PMI-RMP Exam?  Don't worry you will get what you want here. This course will cover the 5 domains as per the Project management institute: •	Risk Strategy and Planning  •	Stakeholder Engagement  •	Risk Process Facilitation  •	Risk Monitoring and Reporting  •	Perform Specialized Risk Activities.     Tools and Techniques of risk management processes are very important and are tested many times on the real PMI-RMP exam. Risk management tools and techniques are not stated in one book some of them are in the PMBOK Guide and others are in the Practice Standard for Project Risk Management. You will see in the exam some tools and techniques that are not mentioned in the previous books such as Crawford Slip Method (CSM), Pre-mortem, Latin Hypercube ….. etc. Solve and understand all questions in  these practice exams and I am sure you will be able to solve many questions in the real exam. Good luck.

items.title: Introduction to Cyber Security: ISO 27001

visible_instructors.name: Andrew
visible_instructors.title: Andrew James
visible_instructors.job_title: CEO of a International consultancy business

items.headline: Cyber security: Information security management system
objectives_summary: ISMS - introduction to the key concepts of a information security management system

Interpret the requirements of ISO/IEC 27001:2013 in the context of an effective information security  management system

objectives_summary: Finding what Leadership is
